long_description: The North Face Kaiju 4 Tent delivers 3-season car-camping comfort for up to 4 people. This roomy shelter offers ample stand-up space, a full rainfly and a large vestibule that converts to a sunshade. Easy-pitch 3-pole design creates a tall, steep-walled tent shape with 68 in. of standing room. 68-denier polyester canopy features a large door on the front and a shorter back door for access to the small rear vestibule. Full-length rainfly with a 1,200mm polyurethane coating creates a reliable barrier against wet weather. The North Face Kaiju 4 Tent features 6 organization pockets, internal hanger loops and a built-in doormat.
short_description: The North Face Kaiju 4 Tent delivers 3-season car-camping comfort for up to 4 people. This roomy shelter offers ample stand-up space, a full rainfly and a large vestibule that converts to a sunshade.
